articles.title: Jagdeep Dhankhar Is New Vice President, Defeats Margaret Alva: 10 Points
articles.description: Jagdeep Dhankhar, former Bengal Governor, was elected as the Vice President on Saturday. He bested Opposition's Margaret Alva to emerge winner.
